scripts.test:architecture: npm run verify:console && npm run verify:components && npm run verify:boundaries
scripts.verify:console: echo 'Console.log count (should be 0):' && grep -r 'console\.' src --include='*.js' --include='*.jsx' | grep -v test | grep -v setupTests | grep -v logger.js | wc -l
scripts.verify:components: echo 'Largest components (all should be <500 lines):' && find src -name '*.jsx' -exec wc -l {} + | sort -n | tail -10
scripts.verify:boundaries: echo 'Error boundaries (should be 25+):' && grep -r 'ErrorBoundary' src --include='*.jsx' | grep -v test | wc -l
scripts.verify:all: npm run verify:console && npm run verify:components && npm run verify:boundaries
scripts.check:hardcoded: grep -rE '(100|500|1000|5000|10000|Black Market|Detective|Third Path)' src/ --include='*.js' --include='*.jsx' | grep -v 'GameConstants' | wc -l
